title: Vault Index Missing Lesson Content Debug
details:
Issue with vault generate-index CLI tool - lesson content not appearing in generated index files.

Problem: The index file for "05_application-of-ipo" lesson folder is being generated with frontmatter and navigation, but missing the actual content section that should list the video file "05_01_application-of-ipo-video.md".

Investigation findings:
1. The lesson folder contains: "05_01_application-of-ipo-video.md" and "05_application-of-ipo.md" (index)
2. The video file has frontmatter but no template-type field
3. Content categorization should fall back to CategorizeByFilename method
4. Filename contains "video" so should be categorized as "video" type
5. AddLessonLevelContent method should add content by type with ["video", "reading", "transcript", "assignment", "discussion", "note"]

Progress:
- Added debug logging to VaultIndexProcessor.ScanFolderContentAsync to track file scanning
- Added debug logging to VaultIndexContentGenerator.AddLessonLevelContent to track content generation
- Fixed null reference warnings in AddContentByType method by adding proper null checks
- Build now succeeds without warnings

Next steps: Test the CLI tool with debug output to see if files are being properly detected and categorized.
